body_html: I'm really not sure what we can do here, short of rewriting all python files during configure (which would be insane) -- I would suggest using an environment where the python you use in your configure step matches the environment. If someone else has any suggestions, please let us know.

body: I'm really not sure what we can do here, short of rewriting all python files during configure (which would be insane) -- I would suggest using an environment where the python you use in your configure step matches the environment.  If someone else has any suggestions, please let us know.
